paper_abstract: In this article, we construct two classes of t x n, s(e)-disjunct matrix with subspaces in pseudo-symplectic space F(q)((2v+1)) of characteristic 2 and prove that the test efficiency t/n of these constructions are smaller than that of D'yachkov et al. (2005).
paper_title: Efficient Error-Correcting Pooling Designs Constructed from Pseudo-Symplectic Spaces Over a Finite Field
